posts.post_content:
Posted By: Matt
Lots of Cards for Sale in my Google Picasa Album.  T200/T205/T206/T207 some R, M & E cards as well.

This is my experiment of using Picasa Web - please let me know any feedback.
Click on the thumbnail of each card for a larger image as well as the price.  Click the magnifying glass icon on the top right for an even larger image.

Unless specified otherwise, cards will be shipped USPS Priority with Confirmation. Insurance is your option. For payment with Paypal, please add 3%




[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/mwieder"]My Trade/Sale Page[/URL]

Posted By: Richie
Hey Matt, Looks great. A lot of cards look familiar. Richie

Posted By: Matt
Thanks Richie - You are indeed responsible for a few of the cards being in the "Ex-Collection" album - enjoy them!





[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/mwieder"]My Trade/Sale Page[/URL]
